attributes.action: Make Sports Interactive provide a good quality service to customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: sports interactive each year release a game called football manager. every year the game has problems with it. in my opinion i do not think they should be allowed to market a game that is not complete and up to standards! and therfore making the consumer pay money for the unfinished article, u wouldnt want McDonalds to give you a half cooked big mac would you???(which they have done before)

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
